mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MBR_MST (SEQ_MBR, EMAIL, PASSWD, FLG_SUR, CD_STATE, MBR_NM, AGE, GENDER, PHONE, DT_REG, REGISTER) VALUES (#{seq_mbr}, #{email}, #{passwd}, #{flg_sur}, 0, #{mbr_nm}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{phone}, SYSDATE, #{register})
INSERT INTO TB_MBR_DTL (SEQ_MBR, POST, ADDR1, ADDR2, FLG_SMS, FLG_EMAIL, DT_SMS, DT_EMAIL) VALUES (#{seq_mbr}, #{post}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{flg_sms}, #{flg_email}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
